domain.name: Person

domain.description: Top level interests and hobbies groupings, like Food or Travel

domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

text:
@realDonaldTrump .
Do you think reporting economic data instead of #COVID19 data during the #coronavirus crisis is a winning strategy?

You don't understand the average American. For every 1 person willing to go to a hair & nail salon, barber shop, spa, etc. 3 will #StayHome.

Will seniors vote?
